thread.title: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week: Three Arsenal stars and Swansea duo dominate pundit's XI
thread.title_full: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week: Three Arsenal stars and Swansea duo dominate pundit's XI

title: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week: Three Arsenal stars and Swansea duo dominate pundit's XI
text:
1 of 12 Who did Garth Crooks pick in his Team of the Week from Gameweek 22? 
BBC Sport pundit Garth Crooks has named his Team of the Week from the latest round of Premier League fixtures, and Arsenal are the big winners when it comes to getting noticed this weekend. 
The Gunners stole three points late on against Burnley thanks to Alexis Sanchez's penalty, while Swansea City's surprise victory over Liverpool has earned a couple of Swans recognition in Crooks' XI. 
The former Tottenham and Stoke forward has gone for a traditional 4-4-2 this week, with his latest offering much more sensible than some of his previous wacky formations . 
Scroll through the gallery above to see which players have been selected in Crooks' weekly column. Related articles
